data.name: ReadCollection
data.value: select top(1) min(COLL_DT) from CKT_COLLECTION where (ADJ_IND = 'N') and (CONCURRENT_IND = 'N') and (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@otrType = OTR_TYPE) and (@otrId = OTR_ID) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@obgId = OBG_ID)

data.name: ReadDebtDetailObligationTransaction
data.value: select top(1) T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OTR_GENERATED_ID, T1.OTY_TYPE, T1.OTR_TYPE, T1.DUE_DT, T1.CVRD_PRD_START_DT, T1.CVD_PRD_END_DT, T1.PRECNVRSN_PGM_CD, T1.LAST_UPDATED_TMST, T1.LAST_UPDATED_BY, T2.OB_TRN_AMT, T2.CSP_SUP_NUMBER, T2.CPA_SUP_TYPE from CKT_OB_TRN T2 join CKT_DEBT_DTL T1 on (T2.OTY_TYPE = T1.OTY_TYPE) and (T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.OB_TRN_TYP = T1.OTR_TYPE) and (T2.OB_TRN_ID = T1.OTR_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.CPA_TYPE = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.OB_TRN_ID = @obTrnId) and (@otyType = T2.OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = T2.CPA_TYPE)

data.name: ReadObligation
data.value: select top(1) CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, OB_ID, DTY_GENERATED_ID, OTHER_STATE_ABBR, OB_DSC, HISTORY_IND, PRIM_SEC_CD, AOD_BAL_CURR_ARR, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_TMST, ORD_TYP_CD from CKT_OBLIGATION where (OB_ID = @obId) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber)

data.name: ReadSupported
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, RECOMP_BAL_FROM_DT, TRIGGER_TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC where (TYPE = @type) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber)

data.name: UpdateDebtDetail1
data.value: update CKT_DEBT_DTL set CVRD_PRD_START_DT = @cvrdPrdStartDt, CVD_PRD_END_DT = @cvdPrdEndDt, PRECNVRSN_PGM_CD = @precnvrsnPgmCd, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy where (OBG_GENERATED_ID = @obgGeneratedId) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (OTR_GENERATED_ID = @otrGeneratedId) and (OTY_TYPE = @otyType) and (OTR_TYPE = @otrType)

data.name: UpdateDebtDetail2
data.value: update CKT_DEBT_DTL set PRECNVRSN_PGM_CD = @precnvrsnPgmCd, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy where (OBG_GENERATED_ID = @obgGeneratedId) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (OTR_GENERATED_ID = @otrGeneratedId) and (OTY_TYPE = @otyType) and (OTR_TYPE = @otrType)

data.name: UpdateObligation1
data.value: update CKT_OBLIGATION set OB_DSC = @obDsc, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATE_TMST = @lastUpdateTmst where (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (OB_ID = @obId) and (DTY_GENERATED_ID = @dtyGeneratedId)

data.name: UpdateObligation2
data.value: update CKT_OBLIGATION set OTHER_STATE_ABBR = @otherStateAbbr, OB_DSC = @obDsc, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATE_TMST = @lastUpdateTmst, ORD_TYP_CD = @ordTypCd where (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (OB_ID = @obId) and (DTY_GENERATED_ID = @dtyGeneratedId)

data.name: UpdateSupported
data.value: update CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC set LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, RECOMP_BAL_FROM_DT = @recompBalFromDt, TRIGGER_TYPE = @triggerType where (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (TYPE = @type)
